question: Describe swirl sign in intracerebral hemorrhage.
ideal_answer: Swirl sign is described as areas of low attenuation, radiolucency or irregular density. It was previously described in epidural hematomas. In intracerebral hemorrhage swirl sign is associated with greater hematoma volume, unfavorable outcomes and greater mortality risk.
